item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description: Work Experience February 2017 - present Software Engineer (iOS Developer) Tieto / Szczytnicka 11, 50-382 Wrocław I worked as a full stack iOS developer on two projects. In both, application was responsible for connecting to an external device, setting and managing the device. Application for a hybrid watch (Kronaby) Responsible for a design and development of an iOS application allowing bidirectional BLE communication. Development in Swift for both back-end and front-end solutions.

Hi! I’m Mateusz Karwat and I live in Wrocław, Poland. I’m a developer and I’m in love with Swift. Lately, I put all my effort in Swift language and platforms related with it. To see what I’ve published so far you can visit my Github profile. To find out more about my professional experience you can go to this page or visit my LinkedIn profile. If you find mistakes in this site, don’t hesitate to make a pull request on the Github repository.
I’m an enterprenour and I run my own company. Below you can find all necessary informations to check my company at CEIDG. NIP: 797-201-67-36 REGON: 366247599
